Union Market is a gourmet  food hall  in Northeast  Washington, D.C. . Bon Appétit called it one of the 5 best food halls in the United States. Union Market is owned by Edens, a South Carolina-based company.

Washington, D.C., has emerged as one of the hottest dining destinations in the country. There's never been a shortage of sites, museums and monuments, but now there are even more diversions to enjoy while you're here.
Book, Enter, Win with RW Diner Rewards. Named the coolest city in America, Bon Appetit's 2016 Restaurant City of Year, Zagat's Hottest Food City of 2016, and earning it's very own Michelin Guide, DC is known for its restaurants. Experience 250 of them with Metropolitan Washington Restaurant Week.
